input_text:
Job Title: Software Architect (Remote)

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
SaaS shop is looking for a product-minded Software Architect to join their growing team!

This Jobot Job is hosted by: Sydney Weaver

Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply Now" button and sending us your resume.

Salary: $140,000 - $175,000 per year

A bit about us:

Embark on an exciting journey with a pioneering technology firm at the forefront of software innovation. We are on the lookout for a seasoned Software Architect to spearhead our software design initiatives, enhancing scalability, maintainability, and overall performance. Our ideal candidate is someone who thrives in architecting microservices-based applications and optimizing database schemas, with a passion for leading teams and driving projects to success.

You will play a pivotal role in the planning and execution of software projects, making sure they align with business goals and technology strategy. This role requires a deep understanding of Microservice-based architecture, C# .NET, Azure, Cloud Application Design patterns, TypeScript / Angular, and web and mobile application development.

Why join us?

100% remote, Great Benefits (medical, dental, vision), pet insurance, Growth Opportunity, Great Culture, PTO, 401K + match, and much more!

Job Details

Qualifications:

 8-12+ years of hands-on experience in architecting software with a strong emphasis on C# and Microservices frameworks Expertise in designing scalable, high-performance solutions within cloud-based architectures, preferably Azure. Knowledge of mobile app development is a plus, adding value to our comprehensive tech solutions. Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field, with a strong foundation in software development principles (Master's degree preferred) Full-Stack experience with TypeScript and Angular (or React) Strong leadership qualities, with the ability to communicate effectively, solve problems efficiently, and collaborate across multidisciplinary teams. A proactive approach to project management, with experience leading projects to successful completion. Experience in workforce management, Human Resources Information Systems (HRIS), Human Capital Management (HCM), Payroll solutions, healthcare, or related fields is preferred. Up-to-date awareness of emerging software development technologies and methodologies. Be proactive in evaluating and recommending new technologies to enhance product offerings.

Responsibilities:

 Engineer innovative software solutions using Microservice architecture, C#, .NET, Azure, TypeScript, Angular, emphasizing quality and forward-thinking design. Architect scalable, robust applications leveraging Cloud Application Design patterns, ensuring long-term viability. Lead cross-functional collaboration for feature development, from conception through deployment, aligning with project objectives. Mentor and guide both local and offshore development teams, promoting best practices, design patterns, and a culture of continuous learning. Champion the integration of new technologies to enhance development efficiency and application performance. Ensure exceptional application performance and quality, proactively addressing any issues to maintain high standards of code integrity. Facilitate project planning and execution, defining clear goals, timelines, and expectations with stakeholders. Maintain rigorous design documentation, supporting a structured, scalable approach to software architecture and development.

Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply Now" button. Software Architect (Remote)

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
